channel.title: How Do I Change the Default System Hostname? :: Salix Documentation
channel.description: The easy way to do it, is to simply run the gtkhostsetup Salix system tool. Otherwise, you may follow the instructions below: If you completed a FULL mode Salix installation, the default hostname is set to darkstar.example.net (inherited from Slackware). If you need to change the hostname you can edit the /etc/hosts and /etc/HOSTNAME files accordingly. For example: /etc/hosts: # # hosts # This file describes a number of hostname-to-address # mappings for the TCP/IP subsystem.
